name: The Stupendous Sunfire Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Sunfire's father was one of the victims of Little Boy, the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima, Japan.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Sunfire's mother was the victim, not his father. It is because of this radiation, one theory goes, that Sunfire and his sister were born as mutants.

Shiro Yoshida.

	Shiro Yoshida was born to a mother who soon after died of radiation poisoning, which caused a hatred of the United States to grow in young Shiro.

questions.text: Which one of these superpowered beings is NOT Sunfire's relative?
questions.explanation:
Lady Deathstrike.

	Sunpyre is Sunfire's sister from another mother, while Mariko is his cousin. The Silver Samurai is Shiro's half-cousin. Lady Deathstrike is not related to Sunfire, but the two have engaged in battle against each other.

questions.text: Sunfire's uncle convinced him to attack the United States. What was the uncle's name?
questions.explanation:
Tomo.

	Uncle Tomo killed Sunfire's father in front of his eyes, causing Sunfire to come to his senses and kill Tomo in retaliation. Sunfire then stopped fighting and surrendered.

questions.text: Sunfire operates mainly as a solo hero, but he has worked with the X-Men. What other team did he briefly and officially join?
questions.explanation:
Big Hero 6.

	Big Hero 6 was a government-sanctioned superhero group in Japan. Another member was the Silver Samurai, Sunfire's relative and a fellow mutant.

questions.text: Sunfire was a member of X-Corporation. Which branch did he serve in?
questions.explanation:
Mumbai.

	Also serving in the Mumbai branch were Warpath, a super-strong Native American mutant, and Feral, who lost her powers due to the Decimation storyline.

questions.text: Sunfire battled Lady Deathstrike in the tenth issue of "Rogue".
questions.explanation:
True.

	The cybernetically-enhanced Lady Deathstrike is usually Wolverine's nemesis, but she chopped off Sunfire's legs, leaving him in critical condition.

questions.text: Whom did Sunfire ask to battle Lady Deathstrike after she came to kill him?
questions.explanation:
Rogue.

	Having absorbed Sunfire's powers and his personality due to longtime physical contact, Rogue was able to stave off Lady Deathstrike, but left Shiro even worse off than before!

questions.text: Which Horseman of Apocalypse did Sunfire serve as?
questions.explanation:
Famine.

	Sunfire was healed and upgraded as a Horseman; Apocalypse even restored his legs! Shiro was able to break free of Apocalypse's mind control and carried Gambit, who was currently Death, to Mister Sinister.

questions.text: In the House of M timeline, Sunfire became the emperor of Japan.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Not only did he become emperor, he was actually very good at it! He was also secretly a head of Project: Genesis, with the goal to turn humans into mutants.
